text: John Lowry Dobson (September 14, 1915 - January 15, 2014) was an American astronomer. He known for creating a design for a popular Newtonian telescope, named after him, the Dobsonian telescope.SB & F: Volume 43, Issues 5-6, page 231, American Association for the Advancement of Science 2007 Dobson died at Burbank, California on January 15, 2014.
